description:
Im a simple men that live in Argentina. I like ths sports and the music, but sometimes i like the romantic things.

I'm considered a sincere person, honest, educated and willing to give a hand in any situation.I don't have a detailed preference for a woman because it's more important to me how that person feels about me when they meet me. If you would like to talk to me to meet me, please send me a message and I will gladly respond :)
intent: Fun, Friendship, Romance, Serious Relationship, Marriage
